example.text: Unsurprisingly, Harlan Crow has refused to respond to my questions about his lavish gifts to Clarence Thomas. Mr. Crow is relying on the same baseless arguments that failed Donald Trump in his attempt to stonewall Congressional oversight.

There is a bipartisan consensus that the current declassification system is broken. It’s past time to bring this outdated system into the 21st century to save time, resources, and taxpayer dollars. Today we’re introducing our comprehensive bipartisan bill to get it done. [[url]]
Big congrats to [[user]], [[user]] & [[user]] for earning these $1 million federal awards to lead cutting-edge research in Oregon, thanks to the CHIPS & Science Act. [[url]]

Work reporting requirements are nothing more than a Republican scam to rip health care coverage away from Americans who they have judged to be unworthy. Poverty is a policy choice. Forcing more Americans into poverty is exactly their intention. [[url]]

The assertion that the Finance Committee lacks a legislative basis for investigating the abuse of gift taxes by the wealthy is preposterous. Mr. Crow is in for a cold dose of reality if he really believes his gifts to Justice Thomas are immune from congressional investigation.
